name: Pact (porousnapkin)
description:
A turn-based strategy roguelike. Make a pact with a demon for world changing powers and survive the consequences. Use your powers to explore the world, build an army, create ludicrous wealth, or even build a bank!

Pact is at an early stage of active development. Help me make Pact the best game it can be. Discuss what's working and what's not on Discord or follow updates on Twitter or the Newsletter.
